name: tslint-immutable
description: TSLint rules to disable mutation in TypeScript.

scripts.test: yarn run tsc && mocha tests/*.ts --require ts-node/register
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && node scripts/publish.js major
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && node scripts/publish.js minor
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && node scripts/publish.js patch

author: Jonas Kello
